string.text: FOUL! Your opponent was fighting outside the joust. Został{?OPPONENT_GENDER}{?}a{\?} has been disqualified!
Pawns travel toward the opponent's home-tile. Upon reaching the last tile, they will move back towards their own home-tile. Enemy pawns can be captured along the way.
How much? How much money? Be quick.[ib:hip][rb:trivial]
Naszym planem jest utworzyć linię obronną.
You have arrived at {SETTLEMENT} to raid it. Some of the residents have gathered to resist you. Raiding this village will cause a war with the {KINGDOM}.
Capturing is done by surrounding an opposing pawn from both sides with your own pawns.{newline}Pawns can also be captured by blocking them against the center tile. This works for both players.
Open the gates and sally out!
Donate to Troops{newline}You will not be able to undo this action.
{TROOP_NAMES_BEGIN}{?IS_PLURAL} i {?}{\?}{TROOP_NAMES_END} {?IS_PLURAL}are{?}is{\?} screening against enemy moving behind our back.
Musisz znajdować się w tym samym miejscu co dana postać, aby móc z nią porozmawiać
Wygląda na to, że trwają przygotowania do turnieju. Nagrodą za zwycięstwo ma być {ITEM}.
You've supported the conspiracy against the Empire!
Naszym planem jest próba utrzymania tego wąskiego przesmyku.
Nie udało się wykorzystać tekstu ze schowka, jako ustawień parametrów ciała!
No proszę. A cóż to za muszka wpadła w nasze sieci?
Zdobądź jeszcze {REQUIRED_XP_FOR_NEXT_LEVEL} punkt{?REQUIRED_XP_FOR_NEXT_LEVEL>1}{?REQUIRED_XP_FOR_NEXT_LEVEL>4}ów{?}y{\?}{?}{\?} doświadczenia w tej umiejętności, aby awansować ją na kolejny poziom
{TROOP_NAMES_BEGIN}{?IS_PLURAL} and {?}{\?}{TROOP_NAMES_END} wycofuj{?IS_PLURAL}ą{?}e{\?} się w bezpieczne miejsce.
So be it... As my father says, a journey's not worthy of the name if you don't to kill anyone.
Taa, to był mądry wybór. Wróć tu jeszcze kiedyś, bo miło się z tobą robi interesy.[ib:closed][rb:positive]
Zaiste dobry wybór, {?PLAYER.GENDER}moja pani{?}panie{\?}. Moi chłopcy znają się na rzeczy i wiedzą, jak zapracować sobie na swój żołd.[rb:very_positive]
{TROOP_NAMES_BEGIN}{?IS_PLURAL} i {?}{\?}{TROOP_NAMES_END} prowadz{?IS_PLURAL}ą{?}i{\?} harce z tylnych linii.
You are trapped by enemies. But your men are in no condition to fight.
Good. Sometimes it's better to shear the sheep than eat them.
Arrr.. You'd best not be toying with us.
Nie można wyrzucić z klanu członków rodziny.
Zdobądź jeszcze {SKILL_LEVEL_FOR_LEVEL_UP} punktów umiejętności, aby awansować tę postać na następny poziom.
There is already an unresolved decision on this settlement.
You've constructed a barrier against your opponent, but have fewer pawns left. Przegrywasz!
Zebranie twojej armii może trochę potrwać.
FOUL! No hitting your opponent's horse. You have been disqualified!
I am glad to hear that. Killing is thirsty work for us too.
A player wins if his opponent can't make any more jumps (captures).
You are on the wrong side!
Though it seems most people are managing to get by, many seem angry, and you overhear a few passers-by muttering that their patience is giving out. You sense something may be stirring.
As you attempt to force the villagers to give you supplies, some of the residents gather to resist you.
Clan doesn't have any available heroes to lead the new party.
Nie mamy nic - żadnego srebra, żadnych towarów.
Your opponent constructed a barrier against you, and you have fewer pawns left. You lost the game!
That'll do. For now, anyway. Travel safe - and I hope to see you again.[ib:closed][rb:positive]
Despite the hardship, you hear few murmurs of complaint, and people seem to trust their rulers to lead them through adversity.
Dowodź symulacjami bitew. Wygrywaj trudne bitwy. Ratuj się ucieczką, poświęcając swoje jednostki, jeżeli będzie to konieczne.

Executing a prisoner will negatively affect your reputation and will decrease your relation with the prisoner's faction/clan.{newline}You will not be able to undo this action.{newline}Are you sure you want to execute this character?
Leadership of the formation has been given to {HERO_NAME}.
To wszystko, co mamy: {ITEM_LIST}. Weź je sobie, ale pozwól nam żyć.
Mangonel{NEWLINE}Throws rocks over a distance using torsion strings.{NEWLINE}Equally effective against walls, enemy siege engines and their operators.
Strzel z Mangonela{NEWLINE}Throws jars filled with Greek fire, combines the already deadly power of mangonels with fire.
Obecnie w tym mieście nie rozgrywa się żaden turniej.
Wioska jest średnio zamożna. Ludzie wyglądają na dobrze odżywionych, zwierzęta również. Chłopi krzątają się wokół, wykonując niezbędne sezonowe prace.
You are outside the {SETTLEMENT_NAME}. You cannot enter because the castle belongs to the enemy.

Nieźle, {PLAYER.LINK}, naprawdę nieźle. Udalo ci się pokonać nie mniej, niż {OPPONENT_COUNT} przeciwników. Twoje wyczyny bardzo spodobały się publiczności. No i oczywiście wygrywasz nagrodę w wysokości {PRIZE}{GOLD_ICON}.
You will lose {INFLUENCE_COST} influence if you abandon the army.
Other party is over their troops limit.{newline}They will temporarily keep their troops but after some time they will quickly abandon their party.{newline}Are you sure?
You hear much praise for the wisdom of the rulers who have achieved this prosperity.
Naszym planem jest utwożenie obronnego pierścienia wokół naszych jednostek dystansowych.
Duel your opponent on foot for victory!
Afraid we'll need to make an example out of you, then. Don't bother begging for mercy.[ib:aggressive][rb:very_negative]
To spowoduje, że gra nie zostanie zapisana i wrócisz do Menu Głównego. Na pewno chcesz wyjść?
You hear few complaints and people seem to have confidence in the authorities.
FOUL! No fighting outside of the joust. You have been disqualified!
{TROOP_NAMES_BEGIN}{?IS_PLURAL} and {?}{\?}{TROOP_NAMES_END} {?IS_PLURAL}are{?}is{\?} fighting enemy inside the walls.
Buduj i steruj maszynami oblężniczymi. Z powodzeniem wykorzystuj sprzęt w czasie oblężenia, tak do ataku, jak i obrony.
We've heard what happened to others who refused to join your cause. We've no desire to end up like them and no means to fight you. We'll wear your colors from now until it pleases you no more.
Well done, {?PLAYER.GENDER}madam{?}sir{\?}. Keep the money and wine coming our way, and there's no foe in Calradia you need fear.[rb:very_positive]
Be on your way. Safe journeys.
Najemnicy nie mogą wspierać innych klanów.

Heh! That's quite the bruise you're sporting. But don't worry; everybody gets trounced once in a while. The important thing is to pick yourself up, dust yourself off and keep fighting. That's what champions do.
You have arrived at {SETTLEMENT} to lay siege to it.
Zarabiaj kupując i sprzedając towary. Twórz karawany.
Greetings, traveller. Unless you wish your bones to be left in the sand to be gnawed upon by jackals, give us what we want.
Your relation is increased by {MAGNITUDE} to {VALUE} with {CLAN_LEADER}.
{PARTY} is leading the attack on the enemy. You'll be joining {?ARMY_COMMANDER_GENDER}her{?}him{\?} with your troops.

Bagh Chal is a game of Sheep (white) versus Wolves (black).{newline}The wolves have four pawns that start on the four corners of the board. Every turn, one sheep is placed on the board, and one wolf makes a move or capture until all sheep have been placed on the board.{newline}After all sheep have been placed, the sheep can now also move on the board.
You are the leader of the Empire!

Dostępne punkty atrybutów: możesz wykorzystać te punkty do podniesienia poziomu poszczególnych atrybutów. Otrzymasz jeden punkt atrybutów na każd{?ATTRIBUTE_EVERY_LEVEL>1}e uzyskane{?}y uzyskany{\?} {ATTRIBUTE_EVERY_LEVEL} poziom{?ATTRIBUTE_EVERY_LEVEL>1}{?ATTRIBUTE_EVERY_LEVEL>4}ów{?}y{\?}{?}{\?} doświadczenia.
Musimy uderzyc całą siłą i zniszczyć ich maszyny oblężnicze.
We shall stain the sands with your blood, then.
You have arrived at {SETTLEMENT} to raid it. Some of the residents have gathered to resist you.

A pawn may be moved orthogonally, one tile at a time.{newline}A pawn can not be moved back to the tile that it came from in the previous turn.{newline}If a player is unable to move, that player may remove one of the opponent's pawns and still make a move.
Rozstawiasz obóz oblężniczy. Musisz zaczekać, aż zakończą się przygotowania.
Remaining Days With Food: {REMAINING_DAYS}{newline}{newline}Total Food: {TOTAL_FOOD_AMOUNT}{newline}Dzienne zużycie: {DAILY_FOOD_CONSUMPTION}
Miasto rozkwita. Mury, ulice i domostwa wydają się świetnie utrzymane.
Ten towar jest o {PERCENTAGE}% droższy niż średnio
Run along now, little sheep. And be careful of the other wolfpacks out there.
Some of the angry villagers say that they have recently satisfied your demands. It looks like you'll have a fight on your hands if you continue.
Spend your own influence to increase the influence of the selected clan
Jakaż z ciebie dobra osóbka, że nie wysyłasz nas do domu z pustymi rękami.
You can create an army by adding members from the list on the left. To finalize your choices, press "Done".
To miasto bez dwóch zdań przechodzi teraz ciężkie chwile.
Ubij{newline}Nie da się cofnąć tej akcji.

The Calradian Empire is in decline. Even before the murder of the Emperor Arenicos, the once united realm was torn by political rivalries. Today, those factions are in open war. Yet Calradians endure. They are technologically more advanced than their neighbors and their mastery of engineering is not just evident in their aqueducts, beautiful architecture and massive city walls. It also makes them experts in siege warfare.
Can't access banner window right now!
You arrived just in the nick of time! {PLAYER.LINK}. You have my deepest thanks!
Na pewno chcesz to zorbić? Tej akcji nie da się cofnąć.
Our plan is to attack with full force around our infantry.
FOUL! Przeciwnik trafił twojego konia i został{?OPPONENT_GENDER}{?}a{\?} zdyskwalifikowan{?OPPONENT_GENDER}y{?}a{\?}!
What have we here? Looks like the mountain spirits have answered our prayers, and granted us success in the hunt.

You can only move a pawn that has an opposing pawn next to it, to the center tile.{newline}Every pawn can freely be moved one tile along the outer edge.{newline}A pawn on the center tile can move to any available tile.
Wygrywasz pojedynek. Your army is encouraged by this display of your might. Your party gains morale.
Oto twoje pieniądze: {MONEY}{GOLD_ICON}. A tu masz swoje towary: {ITEM_LIST}. Po prost weź je sobie i daruj nam życie, {?PLAYER.GENDER}pani{?}panie{\?}.

When your skill points reach a required threshold, one or more perks will become available.{newline}{newline}This will be notified by a small indicator over the character screen button.{newline}{newline}Click on the character button to view available perk choices.
People openly curse the authorities, as though they feel they have nothing to lose.

The Battanians still remember the olden days when the woods stretched across northern Calradia, and the Empire and its cities had yet to violate their sanctity. The fierce warriors remain loyal to their traditional ways. They paint their faces when going to battle and even their noblemen prefer to fight on foot while using great axes and two-handed swords with deadly efficiency.

Capture your opponent's pawns by surrounding them on both sides. If a pawn moves in between two opposing pawns, it does not get captured.{newline}In the first two images, white pawns get captured by the black pawns. In the last two, there are no captures.
Jak sobie życzysz. Od tej chwili będziem walczyć dla ciebie.
Your unit is expected to: {BEHAVIOUR_NAME_BEGIN}{?IS_PLURAL} and {?}{\?}{BEHAVIOUR_NAME_END}{?IS_GENERAL_SIDE} from {SIDE_STRING}{?}{\?}
Walcz przy użyciu włóczni lub innej jednoręcznej albo dwuręcznej broni drzewcowej.
It will be automatically resolved in {HOUR} hours.
Our plan is to crush them with our cavalry and sweep the rest with a follow up attack.
There's a toll for passin' through this land, payable to us, so if you don't mind we'll just be collectin' our due from your purse...
Good, good. I much prefer a straight-up deal to rummaging through your gut afterward to see what you might have hid there.[ib:hip][rb:trivial]
Nie można dokonywać egzekucji pospolitych żołnierzy
Critical Fail and Fail Whole Persuasion Chance
Pojmano mnie, jednak później udało mi się uciec
Podnoszenie atrybutu {ATTRIBUTE_NAME} ułatwia uczenie się powiązanych umiejętności i powiększa ich limit nauczania.
Well well, look at this! You'd best start coughing up some silver, friend, or me and my boys'll have to break you.
Siege Tower{NEWLINE}Used for getting on to the walls. Better than just ladders

Notice your party speed has dropped because you are carrying too much.{newline}You should reduce the amount of weight you carry to speed up.{newline}You can also increase your party's carrying capacity by recruiting more troops or buying horses and camels.

You put up quite a good fight there. Some very good moves. A few errors, sure, but you definitely show promise. And you earned a prize of {PRIZE}{GOLD_ICON} for knocking down {OPPONENT_COUNT} opponents.
There is already a proposed decision for this policy.
{TROOP_NAMES_BEGIN}{?IS_PLURAL} and {?}{\?}{TROOP_NAMES_END} {?IS_PLURAL}are{?}is{\?} charging at {?IS_PLURAL}different enemy formations{?}an enemy formation{\?}.
You have inflicted {AMOUNT} {DAMAGE_TYPE} damage to {VICTIM_NAME} ({LOST_HP_PERCENTAGE}% HP).

In towns, you can find talented individuals that can aid you.{newline}{newline}These potential companions can be found hanging out in taverns.{newline}{newline}Go to tavern district now to find a potential companion.

You gain a level every time your total skill points total reaches a target value. Leveling up grants focus points to spend.{newline}{newline}If you have free focus points you will see it by a small indicator over the character screen button. Click on the button to review different skills and choose one to increase focus.

Wieża oblężnicza
{NEWLINE}Wznosi atakujących na wysokość murów, wyrównując ich szanse w starciu z obrońcami.
After this troop gains {XP_AMOUNT} xp, one more troop will be available for upgrade
This party will grow in size. It's current size target is {TARGET_SIZE}
Walcz pieszo. Poruszaj się po mapie na piechotę.
{ASKED_LORD.LINK} is in the field and {?ASKED_LORD.GENDER}she{?}he{\?} should be close to {SETTLEMENT_NAME} at the moment.
Only wolves can capture, by jumping over a sheep to an available tile behind it. Capturing also follows the lines on the board.
That was fine fighting, {PLAYER.LINK}. You took down {OPPONENT_COUNT} opponents. Of course you deserve a prize with that performance: {PRIZE}{GOLD_ICON}. Nice, eh?

Every character in Calradia has two equipment sets. Characters use their military set when they are expecting trouble. You can switch between their sets using the buttons over the character's model. Note that most of the armors and weapons are unusable while in civilian set because the civilian set is used when it is inappropriate or forbidden for your character to be heavily armed.

Rumour has it the {ITEM_NAME} around here sells for cheaper than in other towns. If you were to buy some here and take it to {TOWN_NAME}, where it fetches a higher price, you could probably make around {PRICE_DIFF}{GOLD_ICON} of profit per item.

The starting player chooses one of four pawns to be removed from the board.{newline}Then, the other player selects one of his adjacant pawns to also be removed. If the pawn of the starting player was in the center, the other player has to remove one of two pawns in the center too.{newline}{newline}The game now begins.
You're a lord and voting. The ruler will vote in the end and decide the outcome.
Ty tam! Stójże! Oddawaj to srebro, ale już. Nie żartujem.
Nie możesz zarządzać swoim oddziałem podczas bitwy
Szyj we wrogów strzałami z łuku. Oddawaj trudne strzały z dużych odległości.
You are outside {SETTLEMENT_NAME}. You see the banner of {LORD.LINK} flying over the castle gate.
{TROOP_NAMES_BEGIN}{?IS_PLURAL} i {?}{\?}{TROOP_NAMES_END} zbiża{?IS_PLURAL}ją{?}{\?} się na odległość rażenia pociskami.
You have been knocked unconscious and your opponent is granted victory!
Fire Ballista{NEWLINE}Shoots bolts with tips dipped in tar.{NEWLINE}They will deal fire damage to enemy siege engines and wooden structures as well as being deadly against soldiers.
Jeżeli postawisz 100 i wygrasz, to z powrotem otrzymasz {NORMALIZED_EXPECTED_GOLD}
Ach, zatem obawiam się, żę bedziemy musieli ci poderżnąć to gardziołko - tak dla zasady, oczywiście. Za wtargnięcie na nasz teren.
Turniej będzie miał formę pojedynku na kopie.
Zraniono mnie poważnie i pozostawiono na niemal pewną śmierć
Bring forward the proposal to give this settlement to someone else
Umiejętności powiązane z tym atrybutem to:
Wioska rozkwita. Przepełnione wory zboża i załadowane wozy świadczą o tym, jak urodzajne są tu pola.
The village is prosperous. The people look well-fed and content. Healthy animals pull the ploughs and carry the harvests.
You have encountered {PARTY}. They have no chance against your overwhelming power, and they surrender.
Can't access character window right now!

{TROOP_NAMES_BEGIN}{?IS_PLURAL} and {?}{\?}{TROOP_NAMES_END} {?IS_PLURAL}are{?}is{\?} trying to retake {#IS_LEFT}{#}right wall{#}walls on multiple sides{\#}{?IS_MIDDLE}middle wall{?}{\?}{?IS_RIGHT}left wall{?}{\?}.
You've constructed a barrier against your opponent, but you have an equal amount of pawns left. The game is a draw!
Can be slaughtered for meat and hide

Pawns can move to any tile in a vertical or horizontal direction, but they can never jump over other pawns.{newline}Pawns can not move on or over the center tile. Once the king leaves this tile, he can also no longer cross it.
You are outside of {SETTLEMENT_NAME}. You are not allowed inside.
Oto {MONEY}{GOLD_ICON}. Just take it and let us go.
As you attempt to force the notables to give you recruits, some of the residents gather to resist you.
Nadal masz szansę wygrać. Chcesz się wycofać?
Notice how your army cohesion has dropped to a low point, and it is more likely that your army will disperse.{newline}You can click on the army management button to boost your cohesion.
Your help was most welcome stranger. My name is {NPC.LINK}. Can I learn yours?
Stać mi tam. To jest napad.[if:idle_furious]
I was knocked senseless by the enemy
Ten towar jest o {PERCENTAGE}% tańszy niż średnio
Bitwa zakończona! Naciśnij klawisz Tab, aby wyjść...
Obstawiasz {BET_AMOUNT} na siebie i wygrywasz walkę. Oto twoja nagroda, {REWARD_AMOUNT}{GOLD_ICON}.
Are you sure retreat your party?
You can wager gold to increase the prize you take. Every round, the odds will be different and you can wager {MAX_AMOUNT} each time.

Sturgians are the descendants of the foreign tribes of northern Calradia. As the empire expanded into their cold forests, they found that a ready market for the luxurious furs of woodland animals whom they traditionally hunted and trapped. Sturgian chieftains became princes, vying for pre-eminence with the help of Nord mercenaries who migrated into their realm. They are good hunters and wanderers, travelling far in search of opportunies both for trade and for plunder.
You have acted wisely and with respect. You may go.
Poprawiaj swoje stosunki z innymi. Brataj się ze szlachtą. Targuj się.
You're the commander. You will be able to order all formations during the battle.
After this prisoner gains {CONFORMITY_AMOUNT} conformity, one more prisoner will be available for recruitment. Prisoners gain {CONFORMITY_PER_HOUR} conformity per hour.

The Khuzait confederation of steppe tribes used to live a nomadic life, but have recently settled in the eastern frontier of the Empire and are slowly transitioning into an agrarian society with permanent town centers. Despite this, they still retain many aspects of their nomadic life, including their affinity with horses. They are masters of mounted archery, shooting and then galluping out of reach.
Your champion has lost the duel. Your army is disheartened by this defeat. Your party loses morale.
Well met indeed {PLAYER.LINK}. My name is {NPC.LINK} and I am forever in your debt. If there is ever anything I can help you with, just let me know...
{PARTY} has gained {AMOUNT_TO_ADD} renown. {CLAN}'s new renown is {NEW_RENOWN}.
Nie możesz wyrzucić towarzysza, który rozwiązuje problem.
Miasto jest dość biedne. Ludzie wyglądają na niedożywionych.
{TROOP_NAMES_BEGIN}{?IS_PLURAL} and {?}{\?}{TROOP_NAMES_END} {?IS_PLURAL}are{?}is{\?} waiting for other siege machines to arrive.
Podbuduj morale oddziału różnorodnym jedzeniem (Kwatermistrz). Podnoś dobrobyt osady i wykonuj projekty (Rządca). Spędzaj czas w swoich osadach (Przywódca klanu).
Boosting a project x2 speed for 1 day costs 500
Perks usually become available in pairs.{newline}{newline}Each one grants different bonuses so choose wisely.
Again you save our necks, {PLAYER.LINK}! Truly, you are the best of friends.
Nie można wyrzucić głównego bohatera z klanu.
Odszukuj tropy i kryjówki. Podróżuj po trudnych terenach. (Zwiadowca)
{TROOP_NAMES_BEGIN}{?IS_PLURAL} and {?}{\?}{TROOP_NAMES_END} {?IS_PLURAL}are{?}is{\?} shooting from the castle walls.
You're over your prisoners limit.{newline}You will temporarily keep your prisoners but after some time they will quickly escape your party. You will also slow down.{newline}Are you sure?
Zaproponuj wypędzenie tego klanu z królestwa
You can sell off all prisoners at once.{newline}{newline}Or you can engage with the ransom broker to pick them individually.
Sorry, I don't know of any good trading tips at present.
Grain is usually the cheapest food you can buy.{newline}{newline}Other types of food may grant various bonuses when consumed.{newline}{newline}Buy some food now.
Klan nie ma wolnych miejsc na oddziały.
The tournament will be a horse race.
Sure, I'll give you a tip. I just bought some {ITEM_NAME} from {SETTLEMENT} at a price of {BUY_COST}{GOLD_ICON} to sell at {DESTINATION} for {SELL_COST}{GOLD_ICON}.
Your opponent constructed a barrier against you, but you have more pawns left. You win the game!
Bitwa przegrana. Naciśnij {leave_key}, aby przejrzeć wyniki.
You will slow down dramatically. Be careful.
Today's not your lucky day, friend. How about you hand over your silver? Be a real shame to have to cut anyone's throat.
Well met {PLAYER.LINK}. I am {NPC.LINK}. Thanks for your help and I hope we meet again.
Utrzymuj wysokie morale w swoim oddziale. Twórz i prowadź armie.
{TROOP_NAMES_BEGIN}{?IS_PLURAL} i {?}{\?}{TROOP_NAMES_END} broni{?IS_PLURAL}ą{?}{\?} kluczowych pozycji w zamku.
Click on the talk button to start conversation.
You see people gathering in the village to resist you. What do you want to do?
Dobrze! Dobrze! A teraz won! Zmykaj już![ib:closed][rb:positive]
Masz na to zbyt mało materiałów.
The villagers here are few and frightened, and they quickly scatter and run before you. The village is at your mercy.
Pojedynek się zakończył, a przeciwnik zdołał cię dziś pokonać...
Stop there - easy now. The great eternal sky has given these lands to us. No one passes through here without our permission.
Punkty skupienia służą temu, aby przyśpieszyć prędkość uczenia się dowolnej umiejętności.
Greetings, traveler. Welcome to our forest. We're going to have to collect a small toll.
Hello, traveler. Hope you brought your purse. See, we're what you might call brigands, and I'm afraid we can't let you pass without paying us a bit of coin.[if:convo_delighted]
Very well - we shall cleanse this land with your blood.

The Aserai are the inhabitants of the Nahhas desert, a mixture of nomadic bedouin and settled oasis farmers. They are famous for their horsemanship and their knowledge of the learning of many lands, especially medicine, gained from lying on some of the continent's most lucrative trade routes. Each clan is fiercely proud of its lineage and often jealous of the others, but when united by a charismatic leader, they become a major force in the south.

Welcome to Mount&Blade II: Bannerlord Gamescom demo!{newline}This demo showcases the mid-game features of Bannerlord!{newline}You are free to resolve issues, conquer settlements, govern cities, join tournaments, trade or just hang around in the game world. {newline}Have fun and don't hesitate to ask if you have any questions.
Our plan is to fall back in formation to fight another day.
Bring this policy to a vote
You will not be dissapointed {?PLAYER.GENDER}madam{?}sir{\?}. You will not find better warriors in all Calradia.[rb:very_positive]

When a stack lands exactly on its home-tile, all pawns of the player who controls the stack are returned to that player's hand, and can be re-used. The pawns belonging to the other player are eliminated from the game.
You caused trouble on my territory... I didn't care for that.
Nie jesteś w stanie wykonać żadnego ruchu. Opuszczasz kolejkę.
Bezpiecznych podróży! I nie daj się nikomu obrabować, poza nami, oczywiście!
You've found the third and final banner piece!
Your unit is expected to: {BEHAVIOUR_NAME_BEGIN}{?IS_PLURAL} and {?}{\?}{BEHAVIOUR_NAME_END}
Cena tego towaru jest zbliżona do średniej
All right. So how much do you value your life?[ib:hip][rb:trivial]
Yet the prosperity is clearly not benefiting everyone equally. People seem angry, complaining endlessly about new rural migrants, rising prices, and those who are profiting more than others.
You need to select an outcome and how much you want to support that outcome.
Musisz być dowódcą armii, by móc nią zarządzać
Wolves and sheep move in the same way by sliding along the lines on the board, one tile per turn.
Make it worth our while not to kill you.
Can't access kingdom window right now!
Zaczekaj, aż twój przeciwnik zajmie pozycję

If you can beat {OPPONENT_COUNT_1} opponents before going down, you'll earn {PRIZE_1}{GOLD_ICON}. You'll get {PRIZE_2}{GOLD_ICON} for striking down at least {OPPONENT_COUNT_2} opponents, {PRIZE_3}{GOLD_ICON} if you can defeat {OPPONENT_COUNT_3} opponents, and {PRIZE_4}{GOLD_ICON} if you can survive long enough to beat {OPPONENT_COUNT_4} opponents. If you can manage to be the last fighter standing, you'll earn the great prize of the fights, {PRIZE_5}{GOLD_ICON}. Sounds good, eh?[rb:trivial]
Move to screen us against foes moving behind our back
Your men have just join your party
Wioska jest biedna. Ludzie wyglądają na niedożywionych. Zwierzęta chorują i zdychają. Pola uprawne powoli zarastają chwastami, gdzyż brakuje rąk do pracy, aby się nimi zająć.
Hello there, little lost sheep. We are wolves of the mountains, and we would like a moment of your time...
You have voted and the ruler has decided on the outcome.
This party will NOT grow or shrink in size. It will try to keep it's size as it is.
Ride forth and attempt to strike your opponent!
You don't have a high enough relation to acquire this troop. {newline} You have {REL1}. You need {REL2}.
There are bandits inside this place. Do you want to attack them?
You bet {BET_AMOUNT} on yourself but you have been defeated.
You cannot disband an army while it's in a map event.
Halt! Your foreign feet on this sacred land offend our ancestors. What are we going to do about that?
Moving pawns is only possible by capturing pawns from your opponent.{newline}Capturing is done by orthoginally jumping over 1 or more opposing pawns.
Can't access clan window right now!
Defy us, will you? We'll drink from your skull!
During battles, holding down the Alt key shows markers on enemy and allied formations.
You are trapped by enemies. You are not in no condition to fight. Your only option is to surrender.
You've started the conspiracy against the Empire!
The tournament will be a melee group fight.

A pawn that lands on a tile with an opposing pawn already there, will capture that opposing pawn. The captured pawn will be stacked underneath the invading pawn.{newline}A stack of pawns can be also be re-captured as long as the top pawn belongs to the opponent.{newline}As soon as a pawn makes a capture, it will move back towards its home-tile in the next turn.
Nie możesz rozwiązać armii będąc w tej armii.
Bitwa zakończona. Naciśnij {leave_key}, aby przejrzeć wyniki
Ten oddział już jest w trakcie rozwiązywania się
You have rejected a challenge to a duel. Your army is disheartened by this display of cowardice. Your party loses morale.
Do you wanna join my clan giveaway?TODO_TODO_TODO_TODO_TODO_TODO_TODO_TODO_TODO_TODO_TODO_TODO_TODO_TODO_TODO_TODO_TODO_TODO_TODO_TODO
Nie możesz przejrzeć ekwipunku w trakcie bitwy!
Our plan is to remain on the defensive.
So how much are you going to give us?

Ha! Nothing like a good jab in the gut to let you know you're alive, eh? Looks like you managed to take down {OPPONENT_COUNT} opponents. Not bad. But that won't bring you any prize money. Now, if I were you, I would go back there and show everyone what I can do...
As you attempt to force the villagers to give you supplies, some of the residents gather to resist you. Fighting them will cause a war with the {KINGDOM}.
Rebels are attacking this settlement. Do you want to interfere?
Napadaj na karawany. Werbuj i prowadź bandytów. Przekradaj się do wrogich miast. Wręczaj łapówki. Uciekaj z niewoli.
We are taking our products to the market at {TOWN}.
You have been awarded the right to carry a banner. Your banner will signify your status and bring you honour. Which banner do you want to choose?
The tournament has ended. {TOURNAMENT_FINAL_PARTICIPANT_A} wins by beating {TOURNAMENT_FINAL_PARTICIPANT_B} in the final round.
This party will shrink in size. It's current size target is {TARGET_SIZE}
The village is going through hard times. Farm tools are rusty and broken. Brush and weeds are reclaiming the outermost fields.
You've found the second banner piece!
Now out of my sight, you mangy cringing cur!
You've supported the conspiracy against the enemies of the Empire!
You've beaten your opponent and won the game!
Pomagaj rannym żołnierzom wyzdrowieć w osadach.
Despite the poverty, you hear few words of complaint, as though people are too beaten down to expect any change.
Zmuś tę armię do rozwiązania się
Aye, what have we here? There's a tax for passage in these parts, traveler, paid either in coin or in blood.
Ta strona wyjaśnia podstawowe założenia gry w Bannerlorda
You've found the first banner piece!
To keep track of a settlement on the campaign map, press the circle next to its name.
Bitwa wygrana. Naciśnij {leave_key}, aby przejrzeć wyniki
Troops that are ready to upgrade are marked with a special icon.{newline}{newline}Some troops may have two possible upgrade paths.
So you intend to fight, little sheep? Let's see your horns then.
You are trapped by enemies. But your men are in no condition to fight. Your only option is to surrender.
Bring this policy to a vote, again
Congratulations, champion! Your fight there was something to remember! As the last one standing, you of course win the top prize: {PRIZE}{GOLD_ICON}.
You have lost the duel. Your army is disheartened by your defeat. Your party loses morale.
Umiejętność '{SKILL_NAME}' bohatera musi być na poziomie {MIN_SKILL_AMOUNT} lub wyższym.
A hot day, is it not? Don't tire yourself fighting. Give us what we want and we'll leave.
Good. Now be careful out there. World's full of thieves, not all of them as kind as we are.[ib:closed][rb:positive]
You have our permission to proceed with your journey.
You're the ruler. Your decision will be the final one and will overrule anything.
Stawiasz {BET_AMOUNT} na to, że {FIGHTER_NAME} wygra, jednak został{?FIGHTER_GENDER}a pokonana{?}pokonany{\?}.
The town is prosperous. The people look well-fed and relatively comfortable.
You could not pay all wages, your party loses {reg1} morale.
You hear some complaints about prices, shortages and greedy merchants, but no more than normal.
Food items are also trade goods. You can find trade goods easily with the "Miscellaneous" filter.
Some of the angry villagers grab their tools and prepare to resist you. It looks like you'll have a fight on your hands if you continue.
You're over your troops limit.{newline}You will temporarily keep your troops but after some time they will quickly abandon your party. You will also slow down.{newline}Are you sure?
Ulepszony taran{NEWLINE}Używany do wyważania bram. Lepszy od zwykłego.
Być może ty i ja jakoś się dogadamy.
Turniej dobiegł końca. {TOURNAMENT_FINAL_OPPONENT} wygrywa, pokonując cię w ostatniej rundzie.
Hear that whistling and howling? That's not the wind - it's the ghosts of those who defied us. Prepare to join them.
Your opponent constructed a barrier against you, but you have an equal amount of pawns left. The game is a draw!
Your champion has won the duel. Your army is encouraged by this victory. Your party gains morale.
Dodatkowy rozmiar oddziału dla każdego oddziału w klanie
Dobrze. A teraz ruszaj w swoją stronę. I nie zapominaj o tym, by się nawadniać!

Możesz wykorzystywać punkty skupienia, aby podnieść maksymalny limit nauki wybranych umiejętności. Przy każdym awansie na wyższy poziom doświadczenia postacie otrzymują {FOCUS_PER_LEVEL} punkt{?FOCUS_PER_LEVEL>1}{?FOCUS_PER_LEVEL>4}ów{?}{\?}{?}{\?} skupienia.
Hej, ty tam! Co masz w tych jukach? Co tam niesiesz?
You've scored {CURRENT_PROGRESS} points out of the {TARGET_PROGRESS} needed to succeed in this persuasion attempt.
Two pawns from each player start on the board as shown. Players take turns placing the rest on any available tile, excluding the center tile.

This region is gripped by civil disorder, yet people must still go about their daily chores. For the most part, they not linger long in the markets or make eye contact. But you overhear hushed conversations about the rebels in the countryside. Some seem to be afraid of the rebels, others secretly thrilled that the tables have turned, even for a little while, on the rich and powerful.
Your opponent has been knocked unconscious and you are the winner!
Taran{NEWLINE}Używany do wyważania bram. Lepszy od samych drabin
Podróżuj po mapie z jak największą prędkością. Walcz konno, zdobywając premię do szybkości.
Oh, indeed we can, indeed we can. Provided you have a fat purse and are ready to lighten it, of course.[ib:hip][rb:trivial]
You win the tournament by beating {TOURNAMENT_FINAL_OPPONENT} in the final round.
You've constructed a barrier against your opponent, and have more pawns left. You win the game!
No, no, muszka, króra się wierci i rzuca - poradzimy sobie z tym..
Upon selection, this option will block one random option.
Pojedynek się zakończył. Przytrzymaj {leave_key}, aby wyjść
Na twej drodze staje {PARTY}. Bitwa z nimi oznacza wojnę z frakcją {KINGDOM}.
Naprawdę? I suppose I'll be getting my hands dirty today, then.[ib:aggressive][rb:very_negative]
You come across a battle between {ATTACKER} and {DEFENDER}
Your relation is increased by {MAGNITUDE} to {VALUE} with {HERO.NAME}.
Dołącz do bitwy nie prowadząc ludzi.
Well met {PLAYER.LINK}. I am in your debt for what you just did. I hope one day I will find a way to repay it.
Encumbrance{newline}Total equipped armor and weapon weight.{newline}High encumbrance will slow down your on foot movement speed
Twój przeciwnik chce się wycofać. Przyjmujesz swoją wygraną? Jeśli nie, będziecie grać dalej.
Splendid. See, my lads and I, we're not cruel men. A bit greedy though, that can't be denied, so do be generous.[ib:hip][rb:trivial]
Pojmano mnie i trzymano dla okupu
Heard you got into a fight with some of the people working for {COMMON_AREA_OWNER}. Well, that's no business of mine.
You can choose an available perk by clicking on its button.
We must rush to defend our siege machines lest the enemy destroy them.

Some of your soldiers now have enough experience for an upgrade.{newline}{newline}This will be indicated by a small indicator over the party screen button.{newline}{newline}To review and upgrade your troops click on this button.
You have gained {INFLUENCE} influence. New influence is {NEW_INFLUENCE}.
A magisterial performance, {PLAYER.LINK}. Whack! Crack! You took down {OPPONENT_COUNT} of them. The crowd loved it. And you earned a prize of {PRIZE}{GOLD_ICON}.
Nie możesz anektować osad rządzącego klanu.
With a strong army at your behest, you can conquer an enemy castle or city. This looks like a good target to besiege.
You've started the conspiracy against the enemies of the Empire!

You must maintain food supplies at all times. If you run out of food, your party will lose morale. Your troops may desert you because of low morale.{newline}{newline}You can see your food reserve on the info bar. Hover over it to see how much food your party consumes each day. Since your party needs food, go to marketplace now to purchase some.
You bet {BET_AMOUNT} on {FIGHTER_NAME} and {?FIGHTER_GENDER}she{?}he{\?} won the fight. Oto twoja nagroda, {REWARD_AMOUNT}{GOLD_ICON}.
You are outside {SETTLEMENT_NAME}. Your banner flies over the castle gate.
Completed quests in the last year
Well there, traveller. We've just made landfall in these lands, hoping for a bit of luck with the raiding and pillaging, and aren't you a sight for sore eyes?
You have spotted an enemy army. Be cautious of it.
You can call other lords to your banner. Click on the highlighted army icon on the lower right to do so.
Naszym planem jest podejść nieco bliżej i zasypać ich gradem strzał.
Obecnie nikt w tym mieście nie chce się zaciągnąć do armii.
Używaj kuźni, aby tworzyć nową broń, rafinuj materiały lub przetapiaj starą broń.
Do you want to resolve {DECISION_NAME} decision?
You can see portraits of Important NPCs on the top bar.{newline}{newline}Click on the portrait and choose talk from the menu.
Zjawiasz się we właściwym momencie, {PLAYER.LINK}. Nie zapomnę twej pomocy.
Musimy bronić murów i nie pozwolić, aby wróg dostał się do środka.
Nowa jednostka będzie tu dostępna za jakiś czas.
Twój przeciwnik zdobywa 1 punkt za trafienie!
Well, I'm glad you respect our ancient and sacred privileges.
You've chosen to pledge your alliance to the {KINGDOM_NAME}!
The defenders win when they can move their king to any edge of the board.{newline}The attackers win when they capture the king, or if they can prevent all defenders from moving.
Nie możesz przyznać tej umiejętności więcej punków skupienia
Well then... It was a long voyage, so do dig deep into your purse.
I don't think we have met properly my friend. You just saved my life out there, and I still don't know your name...

A player wins if his opponent has only one or no pawns left.{newline}{newline}Another way to win is by constructing a barrier that has all of the pawns of the opposing player on one side. When a barrier has been constructed, the player with the most pawns left wins.
Możemy osłabić wroga napadając na jego wioski. This looks like a good target to raid.
Twój przeciwnik nie jest w stanie wykonać żadnego ruchu. Opuszcza swoją kolejkę.
You can click on "+" button to add 10 cohesion. Be aware that boosting it costs some influence.
Upon selection, this option will progress the persuasion attempt to the next stage.
Nice! No more sleeping on hard cold rock and dining on stringy squirrel.
The starting player and the amount of tiles you can move each turn are decided by throwing four two-coloured sticks.
I have not found any profitable trades recently.
No to szakale bedą dzisiaj miały wyżerkę.
You've been in prison at {SETTLEMENT_NAME} for {NUMBER_OF_DAYS} {?PLURAL}days{?}day{\?}.
Your relation is decreased by {MAGNITUDE} to {VALUE} with {HERO.NAME}.
We'll take it. You can live. Now go before I change my mind.[ib:closed][rb:positive]
Your relation is decreased by {MAGNITUDE} to {VALUE} with {CLAN_LEADER}.
Jesteśmy do twych usług, {?PLAYER.GENDER}pani{?}panie{\?}. Wskaż nam tylko komu mamy przetrzepać łeb, a my już zajmiemy się resztą.[rb:very_positive]
Zostawiasz za sobą łup, na który ciężko zapracował{?PLAYER.GENDER}a{?}e{\?}ś! Na pewno chcesz to zrobić?
You need to select an outcome.
Brak miejsca w oddziale dla kolejnej jednostki
As you attempt to force the notables to give you recruits, some of the residents gather to resist you. Fighting them will cause a war with the {KINGDOM}.
Dzięki za twą pomoc, nieznajom{?PLAYER.GENDER}a{?}y{\?}. Nie dane nam było wcześniej się poznać, prawda? Jak cię zwą?

Turniej się zakończył. {TOURNAMENT_FINAL_PARTICIPANT_A} wins by beating {TOURNAMENT_FINAL_PARTICIPANT_B} in the final round. Ty zaś odpadł{?PLAYER.GENDER}a{?}e{\?}ś w rundzie {TOURNAMENT_ELIMINATED_ROUND}.

Tablut is a game of attackers (black) versus defenders (white).{newline}The attackers outnumber the defenders, but the defenders don't have to capture to win. Their main objective is to secure their king (center pawn).{newline}The king follows the same movement and capturing rules as the other pawns.
A player wins if his opponent has been blocked and can no longer make any moves.
You've been held prisoner for {NUMBER_OF_DAYS} {?PLURAL}days{?}day{\?} by {PARTY_NAME}.
You can ransom your prisoners off to the ransom broker.{newline}{newline}Znajdziesz go w pobliżu gospody.
Nie możesz się wycofać, wrogowie są w pobliżu!
You can choose to build siege machines by using the squares for ranged engines and the circles for rams and siege towers.
Kupiec nie ma aż tyle pieniędzy! Jesteś pewn{?PLAYER.GENDER}a{?}y{\?}?
Byliśmy na targu w mieście {TOWN} i teraz wracamy do naszej wioski.
Turniej będzie miał formę zawodów łuczniczych.
The wolves win if they can remove 5 sheep from the board.{newline}{newline}The sheep win if they can block the wolves so they can't make any more moves.

The Vlandians are the descendants of adventurers from the west who lived under the Empire for centuries before forming an independent kingdom. With the decline of imperial authority, they have evolved into a well organised feudal society led by a cast of warlike nobles who prefer to fight with spears and lances on horseback.
Ballista{NEWLINE}Shoots bolts at deadly effect. Effective against soldiers.
You are outside the town of {SETTLEMENT_NAME}. You cannot enter because you are wanted by the {FACTION_TERM}.
That's the spirit... We're a band of bastards that you really don't want to mess with.
Nie możesz zebrać armii w trakcie bitwy
Mostly people are content, although you hear some complaints about rising prices, the unequal distribution of wealth, and migrants coming from the countryside.
You shall be slain, then. Ready yourself.
You have arrived at {SETTLEMENT} to raid it. You do not meet any resistance. Raiding this village will cause a war with the {KINGDOM}.
A player wins if his opponent has no more available pawns in hand or on the board.
